top_categories.workout_context: North Wales Gravel X’s uk wales, british gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
North Wales Gravel X rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at North Wales Gravel X when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Racing North Wales Gravel X isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of North Wales Gravel X. Make this intensity feel like home.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at North Wales Gravel X — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The varied gradients at North Wales Gravel X reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
North Wales Gravel X’s uk wales gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
North Wales Gravel X’s uk wales gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at North Wales Gravel X — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on uk wales gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for North Wales Gravel X — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Cadence efficiency makes every pedal stroke at North Wales Gravel X count — smooth technique reduces muscular fatigue over long distances.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for North Wales Gravel X’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at North Wales Gravel X requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on uk wales gravel to build confidence. Expect: uk wales, british gravel, uk.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, TT Threshold, and Over Under to prepare you for 50 miles of uk wales gravel in Ruthin, Wales, UK.
